title: DuckTales: Remastered [Version 1.0.2]

One of the most beloved 8-bit games of all time returns with the release for mobile platforms DuckTales: Remastered!

Join Scrooge on an epic adventure around the world to discover the five legendary treasures! Embark on a journey into the Himalayas to the Amazon, to Transylvania, the African mines and the Moon using the secret map of Uncle Scrooge. But beware of the evil sorceress Magica De Spell and the infamous brothers Shrapnel: their goal is to steal the fortune of Uncle Scrooge, and will stop at nothing. Maybe he needs to risk everything to save his nephews, Huey, Dewey, and Louie, but not without epic boss fights along the way! Hold your hat and play as Scrooge while traveling to the four corners of the world!

GAME FEATURES:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ COLLECT jewelry to UNLOCK over 90 illustrations of original TV series
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Control compatible with BLUETOOTH

DuckTales: Remastered keeps the authenticity of his 8-bit predecessor and features an expanded story with improved and entirely new graphics. The DuckTales fans can relive the classic TV series of the 1980s, with the original voice actors and direct exclusive illustrations of the series files. But this timeless story is ready to conquer a new generation of fans to make a game well done, simple and fun for all ages.

HIGHLIGHTS remastered version:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Characters and animated objects drawn out and carefully crafted scenarios
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Original voice actors, including Alan Young, Frank Welker, Russi Taylor and June Foray
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ New easy way to casual gamers and younger, and the new Extreme mode for the most devoted fans
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Narrative character and extended plot
